sections.heading: committed to jail; receive witness fee
sections.text: A witness committed to jail under subdivision (4) of section 29-507 or 29-508 shall, in addition to the fee provided under section 33-139, receive an amount equal to the amount a witness receives under section 29-1908 for each day held in custody.SourceLaws 198

29-508.02.Witness committed to jail; receive witness fee.

A witness committed to jail under subdivision (4) of section 29-507 or 29-508 shall, in addition to the fee provided under section 33-139, receive an amount equal to the amount a witness receives under section 29-1908 for each day held in custody.

SourceLaws 1981, LB 228, ยง 4.

Cross ReferencesMileage, how computed, see section 81-1176.Witnesses, compensation of, see section 33-139.
